phrases: I do not even know Vegeta!
Even if you take me to Freeza, there is nothing I can tell him!
Thinking back, my life has been a series of hardships...
I do not want to die here!
For crying out loud, what a handful she is.
There are still some things we have to ask you.
We cannot let you die so easily.
How many times do I have to tell you before you get it!?
I do not have anything besides that Dragon Ball!
I wonder how well you will be able to feign ignorance like this in front of Freeza- sama.
So, why is it that Freeza- sama started collecting these Balls, anyhow?
It is probably something lower-rank soldiers like us do not need to know.
Do not you guys have the slightest idea what the Dragon Balls are?
When you get the Dragon Balls together, something fantastic happens.
The Dragon Balls are amazing things that can grant any wish!
If you bring the seven Dragon Balls together, you could have power beyond even Freeza's!
That is why everyone is so desperate for them, you know.
Hey, Buleberry, we do not have time to listen to her hogwash.
So, would not it be better if you guys left me alone,
and went off to gather the Dragon Balls?
I- if you make a wish about wanting to make the universe your own,
Freeza- sama would be thrilled if we brought all seven Dragon Balls to him.
if what she says is true, then we could become rulers of the universe!
That would be the best thing to do.
Come on, let us go where the other Dragon Balls are.
I- I do not know where they are!
Y- you guys go look for them on your own!
You are saying you want to meet a painful fate here, do you?
They are submerged beneath the sea!
That is where they are, huh?
Whoo, that was close, that was close!
But it looks like my body is pretty much able to take it now.
Hey, what are you planning to do!?
We are going to have you lead us to where the Dragon Balls are.
Y- you have got to be kidding me!
I cannot accompany you guys into that sea!
Listen, I will not run away!
Once they realize there are not any Dragon Balls anywhere,
they will kill me for sure.
I do not have anything like a weapon installed.
The most that I have are flares.
At this point, it is time to get desperate.
It is a little bit farther that way.
If I can lure those guys in there...
This is certain to be the place where I die.
They are over there, are not they?
He is going to have them all to himself.
The more the better, you know!
You take it from here, if you please, Monster- san.
What kind of guys are these!?
Good grief, you have got to be kidding me, making me work this hard!
It is been nearly four days.
Dammit, Grand Elder- san is going to be dead.
How about we try drastically raising our pace?
As far away as we have come, there is no way Vegeta will know.
Father will be here really soon.
That settles it, that settles it.
Let us fly at full speed!
If we fly at this speed, we will arrive in an hour.
I have found you at last!
There are two presences- Kakarrot's son, and the runt who was with him.
Though I thought they would be coming here, after my Dragon Balls,
but they are somewhere pretty far away.
I do not know what they are planning, but if I let this opportunity pass,
I probably will not have another chance to force the location...
If I take this one with me,
then even if that woman does seek this place out
with her unusual little device, she will not be able to get all seven.
You are going to pay this time for sure!
We just received a message from the Ginyu Special Corps.
They said that they are currently passing through the area near 9035-XY,
and that they would be arriving shortly.
They are finally arriving, are they?
Seeing as how, fortunately, nothing has happened,
it would appear that Vegeta has been unable to get all seven Dragon Balls together.
Remember this well: Once I get the Scouters the Ginyu Special Corps will be bringing,
I will be able to find you, no matter where you are.
Exactly what sort of men are in this Ginyu Special Corps, who would be arriving shortly?
And with Vegeta having finally discovered Kuririn and Gohan,
is there any way for them to get out of this crisis?
